text.dispatch: Respond to 1510 North Church St in reference to a childbirth call. Reported a 39 weeks pregnant patient's water has broken.
text.gi:
(Use if needed to provide context should the roleplayer not be clearly displaying it)
Mother is pacing around the room, holding her stomach, appears very anxious.
text.backstory:
(Use this section to answer pertinent positive / negative questions about the mother's OB Hx).
4 pregnancies / 1 live birth (Two still bornes).
Last seen at dr two days ago, was put on bed rest due to "something wrong with the baby's head".
Water broken 1 hour ago.
text.talkingPoints:
(Use this section to provide specific information about the baby's presentation - if needed).
The baby is limp and not breathing upon birth
No meconium staining
Airway is clear
(Inject timers will provide more information to give to the recruit).

sample.s: Water breaking, contractions increasing in severity.
sample.e: Laying on couch with headache, then water broke.
